text: The Colonial States Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament is the annual conference basketball championship tournament for the NCAA Division III Colonial States Athletic Conference. The tournament has been held annually since 1994. It is a single-elimination tournament and seeding is based on regular season records. Prior to 2008, when the CSAC was known as the Pennsylvania Athletic Conference, the event was known as the Pennsylvania Athletic Conference Men's Basketball Tournament. The winner, declared conference champion, receives the CSAC's automatic bid to the NCAA Men's Division III Basketball Championship. ==Results== ===Pennsylvania Athletic Conference=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions !Score !Runner-Up |- align=center | 1994 | Cabrini | 114–79 | Beaver |- align=center | 1995 | Cabrini | 85–74 | Beaver |- align=center | 1996 | Cabrini | 85–67 | Allentown |- align=center | 1997 | Cabrini | 80–66 | Alvernia |- align=center | 1998 | Cabrini | 81–70 | Alvernia |- align=center | 1999 | Gwynedd Mercy | 84–74 | Misericordia |- align=center | 2000 | Alvernia | 88–72 | Misericordia |- align=center | 2001 | Cabrini | 73–71 | Alvernia |- align=center | 2002 | Cabrini | – | Neumann |- align=center | 2003 | Alvernia | 80–73 | Neumann |- align=center | 2004 | Gwynedd Mercy | 83–62 | Alvernia |- align=center | 2005 | Gwynedd Mercy | 81–63 | Alvernia |- align=center | 2006 | Alvernia | 66–63 | Wesley |- align=center | 2007 | Alvernia | 70–55 | Immaculata |} ===Colonial States Athletic Conference=== {| class="wikitable sortable" |- !Year !Champions !Score !Runner-Up |- align=center | 2008 | Immaculata | 85–68 | Gwynedd Mercy |- align=center | 2009 | Gwynedd Mercy | 108–96 | Cabrini |- align=center | 2010 | Cabrini | 97–73 | Neumann |- align=center | 2011 | Cabrini | 92–70 | Gwynedd Mercy |- align=center | 2012 | Cabrini | 86–78 | Keystone |- align=center | 2013 | Cabrini | 90–74 | Keystone |- align=center | 2014 | Cabrini | 96–79 | Neumann |- align=center | 2015 | Neumann | 93–92 (OT) | Cabrini |- align=center | 2016 | Gwynedd Mercy | 84–70 | Neumann |- align=center | 2017 | Neumann | 77–53 | Gwynedd Mercy |- align=center | 2018 | Cabrini | 89–76 | Neumann |- align=center |2019 |Rosemont |100–97 |Cairn |- align=center |2020 |Cairn |113–105 |Centenary (NJ) |} ==Championship records== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center;" |- !
